string-array.name: quotes_motivation
string-array.item: "There's a lot of people in this world who spend so much time watching their health that they haven't the time to enjoy it."- Josh Billings

"What's important is to get into shape and then not to have to worry about it. I don't want to get on stage and not being able to do something. Not being physically fit doesn't work for me." - Chris Cornell
"Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle."- Abraham Lincoln
"Exercise is labor without weariness." - Samuel Johnson
"The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be." – Ralph Waldo Emerson
"Don’t give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you." – John Wooden
"The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides a champion from someone who is not a champion."- Arnold Schwarzenegger
"Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it." -Henry David Thoreau
"I'm not a waif-y girl and never will be. I think it's healthy when fitness experts encourage fitness rather than getting a certain body shape."- Sophia Bush

resources.string: Add, edit, delete your own programs, as everybody knows programs consist of exercises. Each program has it\'s own exercise to do. Exercise includes weight, sets and repetitions, it is up to you
You are able to add the day to the week, also add your snap to the week, then you will have the album of your snaps to check your progress
As you change your program exercises (weight, sets, repetitions), your stats will be increased or decreased
Fill all of the boxes, except weight if ex. does not require any weight
Add the image to finish your week
The exercise was failed to update
Let me recommend you this application
Nothing is here, you supposed to done one week
Add the week to start working out
Scroll, zoom in and zoom out the diagram
Add program, clicking the button below
Are you sure that you want\nto exit the App?
Are you sure that you want\nto delete the exercise?
Are you sure that you want to add the day to this week because then you will not able to delete that?
Nothing here, add the day, clicking \'add DAY\' button
Add your snap to see the progress on your album
Add the exercise to your program
